column5: I have a few projects around here that need doing and no time to do them myself. Install a small kitchen down stairs, drywall, pluming and electrical, some painting, a small retaining wall that needs to be built outside, some new shingles on my garage roof. Thought I'd offer it to any OFNr's first. If anyone is interested please let me know ASAP as I want to get it going fairly soon.  Thanks  Cliff

First your dock and now this?  LOL  I'm assuming for these jobs there's more than a few burgers and panfish?  hehe.  Good luck Cliff...I'm sure someone will be interested...it's great you are offering it to members first....a nice perk of this community.
LOL, yes Cliff, this is PAID work I am offering but I'll still provide some burgers and some evening fishing if anyone wants it.
